title: Olive Toon Boom Harmony Rigging - Twitch stream - Part 2

media:group.media:title: Olive Toon Boom Harmony Rigging - Twitch stream - Part 2
media:group.media:description:
Part 2 of Recording from Twitch stream (August 2020)

You can download Olive rig for FREE from my Gumroad page:
https://gumroad.com/kyubumlee

Chapters
0:00 Introduction
0:37 Rigging the eye start
1:36 Node library basics
3:50 Rigging the eye - continued
6:01 Cutter node basics & how to set pivot point
10:05 Eye - continued
11:40 Finding object center for pivot
14:39 Eye lashes
18:07 Eye lid
28:12 Alternate eye lid style rig demo
31:08 Eye lid - continued
38:57 Eye lid shine
52:15 What am I doing right now? - talk
54:40 Eye lid - setting up invisible tag/grabber
1:11:19 Eye brows
1:17:20 Rest of the face
1:27:34 Face and Jaw
1:35:51 Ear
1:46:34 Bangs
1:57:54 Hair
2:04:04 Session conclusion

Software used: Toon Boom Harmony 16
